text: The Left Behind series (or just Left Behind) is a fictional book series written by Tim LaHaye and Jerry B. Jenkins. The series takes place during, and after the rapture. Besides the best-selling fiction book series, there are also graphic novels, CDs, and a Left Behind: The Kids series. == The books == Note: The first three books were written later in time, but are a prequel to the series. #The Rising: Antichrist is Born: Before They Were Left Behind #The Regime: Evil Advances: Before They Were Left Behind #The Rapture: In the Twinkling of an Eye: Countdown to Earth's Last Days #Left Behind: A Novel of the Earth's Last Days #Tribulation Force: The Continuing Drama of Those Left Behind #Nicolae: The Rise of Antichrist #Soul Harvest: The World Takes Sides #Apollyon: The Destroyer Is Unleashed #Assassins: Assignment: Jerusalem, Target: Antichrist #The Indwelling: The Beast Takes Possession #The Mark: The Beast Rules the World #Desecration: Antichrist Takes the Throne #The Remnant: On the Brink of Armageddon #Armageddon: The Cosmic Battle of the Ages #Glorious Appearing: The End of Days #Kingdom Come: The Final Victory == Major characters == *Rayford Steele - Captain for Pan-Continental in his mid-forties *Chloe Steele Williams - Daughter of Rayford and wife of "Buck" *Cameron "Buck" Williams - Journalist for Global Weekly and the husband of Chloe *Bruce Barnes - Assistant pastor at New Hope Village Church *Nicolae Jetty Carpathia - A man from Romania who would become the antichrist == The movies == Note: The first of the books were made into movies starring Kirk Cameron. *Left Behind: The Movie *Left Behind II: Tribulation Force *Left Behind: World at War == Other websites == *Official Left Behind website Category:Christian eschatology
